name: Links/Problem Reporter
author: RaminMT

sections.description:
This plugin simply adds a button to Your site and let users report Your site broken links/problem and You can see them in WP dashboard.
Description Box let You get site visitors name, email or anything You need plus description of what is the problem but if You don’t need this feature simply You can disable It from setting page
With shortcode provided You can use plugin fully customized ðŸ™‚

Features

  • Fast & Light
  • Fully Customizable
  • Ajax Based
  • Secure
  • Dashboard Widget
  • Simple to use with shortcode, jQuery selector and default button
  • Description Box to get email/name of clients and their descriptions about problem
sections.installation:
1. Upload Zip file content to “/wp-content/plugins/” directory and extract it
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place “” in your template’s Single.php file where you want
  4. Or Create Your button and set “RBL_Element” as Its id
  5. Or as an Alternate You Can Use RBL Shortcode: [RBL url=”Link to Be Reported”]Caption of Button[/RBL]

  • More Feature Added

  • Lighter Core

2.2 21/03/2012

  • Making It more Flexible
  • jQuery Selector Added
  • Ability to Change button color, text, text color and adding css style

1.9 21/12/2012

  • Fix Some Bugs And Issues
  • Change Method of Ajax calls

1.7 28/11/2012

  • Make it English and translating to Farsi

1.6 19/11/2012

  • Just Realesed.
